title: 이달의소녀탐구 #119 (LOONA TV #119)
summary:
It is the Pizza Bet episode!!
0:02 -- The director offers them pizza but only one person can eat it (cruel smh). HaSeul
wins a rock-paper-scissors game.
0:25 -- She can now win Pizza for all if she wins against the director. If she loses, there is
no pizza. She participates… (The episode ends at the cliffhanger)
